title: Current Conditions : 70.5F / 21.4C, Scattered Clouds - 6:52 PM CST Feb. 28
text: Issued: 2:57 PM CST Feb. 28, 2017 â€“ National Weather Service ... Lake Wind Advisory in effect from 6 PM this evening to noonCST Wednesday... The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a lakeWind Advisory, which is in effect from 6 PM this evening to noonCST Wednesday. * areas affected... much of Arkansas* timing... this evening... overnight... and Wednesday morning* winds... expect south winds of 15 to 25 mph gusting to 30 mph ahead of a cold front... then northwest winds of 15 to 25 mph gusting to 30 mph behind the cold front.* Impacts... large waves on area lakes and rivers will make boating dangerous. This will be especially hazardous for small boats.Precautionary/preparedness actions... A lake Wind Advisory indicates that winds will cause rough chopon area lakes. Small boats will be especially prone to capsizing.51
